attributes.action: OVERSEAS AID BUDGET TO ASSIST COUNTRIES SEND THEIR PARALYMPIC TEAMS TO RIO.
attributes.additional_details: THESE ATHLETES ARE BEING TOLD 2 WEEKS PRIOR TO THE OPENING CEREMONY THAT THEY NOW CANNOT ATTEND . AN APPALLING SITUATION.
attributes.background: PEOPLE HAVE BEEN TRAINING FOR THIS GREAT OCCASION FOR YEARS. DUE TO PROBLEMS WITH FUNDING,POOR TICKET SALES ETC. THE ORGANISERS ARE REDUCING FUNDING FOR TRAVELLING TO THE GAMES. SOME COUNTRIES ARE NOW SAYING THEY CANNOT AFFORD FOR THEIR TEAMS TO GO TO RIO.

rejection.details:
Sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/164927
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
